I have never felt unsafe at TCC
Great for students who dont know what they want to major in yet or who wants to get their associates degree for cheapter than transfer.
You get the same quality classes as Universities for a great price!

You can go to the student life center and check out whats going on around campus! I vonunteered for a haunted house this halloween and got to dress up and scare the guests! There was food, games, dancing and a costume contest as well!
They have a nice lunch room full of good foods and the student store has good cheap food!
No dorms! There are nice appartments across the street though.

The courses give a good amount of homework and essays! I have only been at TCC for half of one quarter so I havent experianced the more difficult classes yet but I have heard they give quite the homework load.
Dont expect this college to be easy just because it is a community college, TCC is one of the top community colleges in the US. Come to class prepared and ready to learn!

I really like Tacoma Community College, The teachers are helpful and supportive. They all want the students to be as successful as they know we are. The students are all kind and inviting, we are all there for the same reason, to further our education.
pageTitle: Tacoma Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Academic Rigor most courses provided many opportunities to maintain high grades. on occasion i took courses that were challenging and stimulating, however the average class is easy to pass when work is put into it. Tips for prospective students enter college prepared, knowing in advance what you want to study. line your classes up with any universities programs you plan to transfer into. In three sentences tacoma community college is diverse with many cultures and ages. the courses offered are good, however, i have experience both good and bad teachers. unfortunately though, it is difficult to accomplish anything through the office administration and desk workers aren't very willing to put in effort above what is expected.
